member.name: T:BonusMain.Bonus
member.summary:
The Bonus class provides a CLS compliant, MWArray interface to the MATLAB functions contained in the files:
G:\mohmed\Fourth year\Second Term\Image Processing\Magical Newspaper\Project Functions\BonusMain.m

member.summary: Constructs a new instance of the Bonus class.

member.summary: Class destructor called by the CLR garbage collector.

member.name: M:BonusMain.Bonus.Dispose

member.name: M:BonusMain.Bonus.BonusMain
member.summary: Provides a void output, 0-input MWArrayinterface to the BonusMain MATLAB function.

member.name: M:BonusMain.Bonus.BonusMain(System.Int32)
member.summary: Provides the standard 0-input MWArray interface to the BonusMain MATLAB function.
member.param: The number of output arguments to return.
member.returns: An Array of length "numArgsOut" containing the output arguments.

member.name: M:BonusMain.Bonus.BonusMain(System.Int32,MathWorks.MATLAB.NET.Arrays.MWArray)
member.summary: Provides the standard 1-input MWArray interface to the BonusMain MATLAB function.
member.param: The number of output arguments to return.
member.returns: An Array of length "numArgsOut" containing the output arguments.

member.name: M:BonusMain.Bonus.WaitForFiguresToDie
member.summary: This method will cause a MATLAB figure window to behave as a modal dialog box. The method will not return until all the figure windows associated with this component have been closed.
member.remarks: An application should only call this method when required to keep the MATLAB figure window from disappearing. Other techniques, such as calling Console.ReadLine() from the application should be considered where possible.
